subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Charles Scott rushed for a career-high 160 yards on 16 carries, including touchdowns of 8 and 29 yards, and No. 7 L.S.U. rolled to 41-13 victory at home over Appalachian State.
snippet: Charles Scott rushed for a career-high 160 yards on 16 carries, including touchdowns of 8 and 29 yards, and No. 7 L.S.U. rolled to 41-13 victory at home over Appalachian State.
